description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen held off Ferrari's Carlos Sainz to win the Canadian Grand Prix on Sunday and celebrate his 150th Formula One race by surging 46 points clear in the world championship.
title: Verstappen wins in Canada on 150th race start - Reuters.com

title: Melanoma map shows skin cancer is on the rise in Canada - McGill Newsroom
content:
Rates of melanoma, a deadly form of skin cancer, are on the rise in Canada. Those living in southern and coastal areas are most at risk, according to a new study led by McGill University.
